about_the_game:
A Deliciously Twisted Adventure Awaits!

Step into a world where every bite has consequences—and every battle brings you closer to redemption.

Beastly Bites follows a starving young woman cursed by the Food God and transformed into a supernatural food-human hybrid.  

To reclaim her humanity, she must battle food-themed monsters across magical realms, ranging from colorful festival streets to the grand temple. Her journey of redemption and confrontation is driven by fast-paced combat with an oversized chopstick!

Gameplay Features

Dynamic Chopstick Combat: Players wield an oversized chopstick to execute fast-paced, rhythmic combos, counters, and dodges, rewarding skill and timing.

Transformation Progression: The protagonist gradually restores her human form as she defeats food-based foes, providing both narrative and gameplay progression.

Unique Food Foes: Battle against imaginative enemies inspired by cursed food dishes, each with unique mechanics and designs.

Immersive Environmental Storytelling: Explore a surreal, magical realm filled with visually rich and narratively engaging locations such as abandoned festival grounds, mystical lantern-lit gardens, and the Food God’s grand temple.

Controls

Movement: Left Joystick/WASD
Camera: Right Joystick/Mouse
Interaction: L1/E
Skip Dialogue: R1/Left click
Light Attack: L1/Left click
Heavy Attack: R1/Right click
Run: B/Shift
Dash: L2/Ctrl
Targeting: R3/Middle Mouse click
Pause: Start/ESC

About Us

Beastly Bites is the result of eight weeks of collaboration by a team of 15 students from DADIU (Danish Academy of Digital Interactive Entertainment). Hailing from universities across Denmark, we combined our talents in design, programming, art, and sound to create this flavorful, action-packed game.
